parameters.jsCode:
// Parse Flare Capital Partners - healthcare IT/SaaS
// Output ALL known companies with URLs
const results = [];
const vcName = 'Flare Capital Partners';
const seen = new Set();
const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];

// Helper to generate URL from company name
const makeUrl = (name) => 'https://www.' + name.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]/g, '') + '.com';

// Known portfolio companies with URLs [name, url]
const knownCompanies = [
  ['Accolade', 'https://www.accolade.com'],
  ['Aetion', 'https://www.aetion.com'],
  ['AristaMD', 'https://www.aristamd.com'],
  ['Axle Health', 'https://www.axlehealth.com'],
  ['b.well Connected Health', 'https://www.icanbwell.com'],
  ['Bravado Health', 'https://www.bravadohealth.com'],
  ['Brightline', 'https://www.hellobrightline.com'],
  ['Cedar', 'https://www.cedar.com'],
  ['CertifyOS', 'https://www.certifyos.com'],
  ['Cleo', 'https://www.hicleo.com'],
  ['Continuum Health', 'https://www.continuumhealth.com'],
  ['Curana Health', 'https://www.curanahealth.com'],
  ['DoseSpot', 'https://www.dosespot.com'],
  ['Eden Health', 'https://www.edenhealth.com'],
  ['Elation Health', 'https://www.elationhealth.com'],
  ['Ethicos Health', 'https://www.ethicoshealth.com'],
  ['Evidation', 'https://www.evidation.com'],
  ['Firefly Health', 'https://www.firefly.health'],
  ['HealthEdge', 'https://www.healthedge.com'],
  ['Healthie', 'https://www.gethealthie.com'],
  ['HealthVerity', 'https://www.healthverity.com'],
  ['Homeward', 'https://www.homeward.com'],
  ['Jasper Health', 'https://www.jasperhealth.com'],
  ['K Health', 'https://www.khealth.com'],
  ['Kins', 'https://www.getkins.com'],
  ['knownwell', 'https://www.knownwell.health'],
  ['Koa Health', 'https://www.koahealth.com'],
  ['Laguna Health', 'https://www.lagunahealth.com'],
  ['Luma Health', 'https://www.lumahealth.io'],
  ['Lyric', 'https://www.lyric.ai'],
  ['MedTrainer', 'https://www.medtrainer.com'],
  ['Nava Benefits', 'https://www.navabenefits.com'],
  ['NextStep Health', 'https://www.nextstephealth.com'],
  ['Nomi Health', 'https://www.nomihealth.com'],
  ['Notable', 'https://www.notablehealth.com'],
  ['Pattern Health', 'https://www.patternhealth.com'],
  ['Peer AI', 'https://www.peer.ai'],
  ['Persivia', 'https://www.persivia.com'],
  ['Protenus', 'https://www.protenus.com'],
  ['Reify Health', 'https://www.reifyhealth.com'],
  ['RubiconMD', 'https://www.rubiconmd.com'],
  ['SilverCloud Health', 'https://www.silvercloudhealth.com'],
  ['SimpliFed', 'https://www.simplifed.com'],
  ['Solace', 'https://www.solace.health'],
  ['Sword Health', 'https://www.swordhealth.com'],
  ['Tendo', 'https://www.tendo.com'],
  ['Thyme Care', 'https://www.thymecare.com'],
  ['Transcarent', 'https://www.transcarent.com'],
  ['Truepill', 'https://www.truepill.com'],
  ['Turquoise Health', 'https://www.turquoise.health'],
  ['Unite Us', 'https://www.uniteus.com'],
  ['Vori Health', 'https://www.vorihealth.com'],
  ['WellSky', 'https://www.wellsky.com'],
  ['Wheel', 'https://www.wheel.com'],
  ['Zus Health', 'https://www.zushealth.com']
];

for (const [company, url] of knownCompanies) {
  const key = company.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]/g, '');
  if (seen.has(key)) continue;
  seen.add(key);
  results.push({ json: { 'Company Name': company, 'VC Firm': vcName, 'Company Description': `${company} - Flare Capital Partners portfolio company (healthcare IT)`, 'Company URL': url, 'Status': 'New', 'First Seen Date': today, 'Portfolio Addition Date': today, 'Source': 'VC Portfolio' } });
}
return results;

const newCompanies = $input.all();
return newCompanies.map(item => ({ json: { ...item.json, _isNewCompany: true } }));

nodes.name: Fetch Tide Pool Profile
nodes.notes: Fetch the Tide Pool agent lens for evaluation context.

nodes.name: Build Evaluation Prompt
nodes.notes: Combine Tide Pool profile with company data to build Claude evaluation prompt.

nodes.name: Evaluate via Anthropic API
nodes.notes: Call Claude 3 Haiku for company evaluation. Rate limited to 30s between requests.

nodes.name: Parse Evaluation
nodes.notes: Parse Claude's JSON response and map to Airtable fields.

nodes.name: Airtable: Create Evaluated Record
nodes.notes: Create Airtable record with full evaluation data.
